entry.title: Who to blame for all your problems
entry.summary:
Description

What does it mean to conduct a postmortem blamelessly? Why should you run your postmortems without blame? This talk will show you why and how to run blameless postmortems for incidents at your workspace, whether you're a Frontend Engineer or an SRE.

Talk page: https://2019.pycascades.com/talks/who-to-blame-for-all-your-problems/
